p.span: Determine the distance in miles between two locations
xsGetDistance [FROM] (zipcode | lat lon | city region [country]) TO (zipcode | lat lon | city region [country])
Determines the distance (in miles) between the contents of the field 'myZipcode' and 'yourZipcode' using a zipcode->lat,lon mapping contained in the lookup table 'zipcodes.csv'
city region country, lat lon, zipcode
The fields containing the city, region (state) and (optionally) country
The fields containing the latitude and longitude.
A field 'distance' is added to each event with the calculated distance. If this is less than 0, there was no way to calculate the distance for that event.
